price: De ki: Dininizi Allah’a mı öğreteceksiniz? Allah, göklerde ve yerde ne varsa bilir. Allah, herşeyi bilendir.
arabic: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul atuʿallimūna al-laha bidīnikum wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
